title: Come What May
description: Our lives are like branches on a tree, and once you choose to move down one, you almost never can go back and see where the other one would have lead. What-if? In "Come What May", this is the dilemma that 62-year-old Cayla Lysander has lived with and wrestled with. This is one woman's story of "what-if" and how she has found resolution. Or has she?
author: Laura A. Diaz (a.k.a. L. Diaz)
